item.title: PeyrSharp: Version 1.7.0.2307 is now available
item.description: Version 1.7.0.2307 of PeyrSharp is now available, let’s see what’s new. Changelog PeyrSharp.Core New Added Range() method in Stats (#117) Added Variance() method in Stats (#118) Added StandardDeviation() method in Stats (#119) Updated Improved exceptions PeyrSharp.Env New Added UwpApp record (#120) Added the possibility to get UWP apps asynchronously (#120) NuGet Packages PeyrSharp PeyrSharp.Core PeyrSharp.Enums PeyrSharp.Env PeyrSharp.Exceptions PeyrSharp.Extensions PeyrSharp.UiHelpers Links Documentation GitHub GitHub Packages

item.title: PeyrSharp: Version 1.6.0.2305 is now available
item.description: Version 1.6.0.2305 of PeyrSharp is now available, let’s see what’s new. Changelog PeyrSharp.Core New Added a method to convert bits to bytes (#100) Added a method to convert bytes to bits (#101) Added a method to convert mach to km/h (#102) Added a method to convert mach to miles/h (#103) Added a StatusInfo class (#104) Added a method that gets the status info of a URL (#105) NuGet Packages PeyrSharp PeyrSharp.
